1.title: Long ago in the distant past....?

choices: Gets captured by a female jangshi or other mythical Chinese monster
11.content: How will she become a slob?
11.title: Fa Mulan

info.brief_description: It’s time to give Mulan and the girls of Mulan some slobby, gassy and bowl problems
info.description:
Ever wanted Fa Mulan to be a slob? Or any girl from the movies? Well this story is the one for you.

Rules-
1- no death
2- scat, gas and other stuff is allowed (Try not to add full on animal transformations on this one. Not a fan.)
3- no male slobs or wg

Anything besides the rules above are fair game
info.pretty_title: Make a Slob out of you: Mulan
